name: user-management-system
description: User Management System with Angular Frontend and Node.js Backend

scripts.install:all: npm install concurrently --legacy-peer-deps && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd backend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
